summary: E2E testing of Captain Command Centre feature for HI AI-APP.COM. All 19 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI loads correctly at /command-centre and /captain routes with military theme (dark navy #0a1628, tactical green #00ff88). All 7 business verticals displayed with proper styling. Assign Leader dialog and AI Onboarding Kit dialog both working correctly. AI onboarding uses CACHED responses for offline capability.
passed_tests: GET /api/captain/status - Returns operational status with 7 verticals
GET /api/captain/verticals - Returns all 7 business verticals (B2G, B2A, B2B, B2C, B2D, D2D, A2A)
GET /api/captain/vertical/B2G - Returns B2G vertical details with kata system
GET /api/captain/vertical/B2B - Returns B2B vertical details with kata system
GET /api/captain/vertical/INVALID - Returns 404 for invalid vertical
POST /api/captain/assign-leader - Assigns leader to vertical successfully
POST /api/captain/assign-leader with invalid vertical - Returns 400
GET /api/captain/leaders - Returns all assigned leaders
POST /api/captain/onboarding/start - Starts onboarding session with welcome message
POST /api/captain/onboarding/start with invalid vertical - Returns 400
POST /api/captain/onboarding/chat - Returns cached response for 'first task' query
POST /api/captain/onboarding/chat - Returns cached response for 'tips' query
POST /api/captain/onboarding/chat - Returns kata progress info
POST /api/captain/onboarding/chat with invalid session - Returns 404
POST /api/captain/onboarding/progress - Updates kata progress to kata_2
POST /api/captain/onboarding/progress to kata 4 - Achieves ORBIT status
POST /api/captain/onboarding/progress with invalid kata - Returns 400
GET /api/captain/dashboard-metrics - Returns metrics with health score
GET /api/captain/kata-system - Returns 16-Kata system with 4 stages
Frontend: /command-centre route loads Captain Command Centre
Frontend: /captain route loads Captain Command Centre
Frontend: 7 vertical cards displayed with color-coded borders
Frontend: 4 metric cards (Verticals, Leaders, Onboarding, Health Score)
Frontend: 16-Kata Onboarding System section with 4 stages
Frontend: Assign Leader dialog opens with form fields
Frontend: AI Onboarding Kit dialog opens with cached responses
Frontend: Chat input and send button work in onboarding dialog
Frontend: Military theme colors applied (dark navy, tactical green)
Frontend: Status badges (ASSIGNED/VACANT) displayed correctly
critical_code_review_comments: Captain Command Centre implementation is complete and well-structured
All 10 backend APIs working correctly with proper error handling
7 business verticals (B2G, B2A, B2B, B2C, B2D, D2D, A2A) properly configured
16-Kata onboarding system with 4 stages (Context Loading, System Orientation, Vertical Deep Dive, First Mission)
AI Onboarding uses CACHED responses for offline capability - hybrid mode working
Military command style design with proper color scheme (#0a1628 dark navy, #00ff88 tactical green)
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Leader assignment properly deactivates previous leaders before assigning new ones

mocked_api.AI Onboarding Chat: Uses CACHED responses when AI unavailable. Responses are pre-configured for each vertical with welcome messages, first tasks, and tips. Source indicator shows 'cached' or 'ai_fallback' in response.

seed_data_creation: Test leaders and onboarding sessions created during testing (prefixed with TEST_)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Captain Command Centre is a new feature for HI AI-APP.COM Human Potential Management platform. Key features: 1) 7 Business Verticals (B2G, B2A, B2B, B2C, B2D, D2D, A2A) with dynamic leader assignment, 2) 16-Kata Onboarding System (Varun Mayya inspired) with 4 stages leading to ORBIT status, 3) AI Onboarding Kit with hybrid mode (online AI + cached offline responses), 4) Military command style design with dark navy (#0a1628) and tactical green (#00ff88). Backend APIs at /api/captain/* all working. Frontend at /command-centre and /captain routes. MongoDB collections: vertical_leaders, onboarding_sessions. All 19 backend tests passed. All frontend UI elements working correctly.
